verses.verse: At that time<WH6256> Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me<WH6458>, Hew thee two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68> like unto the first<WH7223>, and come up<WH5927> unto me into the mount<WH2022>, and make<WH6213> thee an ark<WH727> of wood<WH6086>.
And I will write<WH3789> on the tables<WH3871> the words<WH1697> that were on the first<WH7223> tables<WH3871> which thou brakest<WH7665>, and thou shalt put<WH7760> them in the ark<WH727>.

So I made<WH6213> an ark<WH727> of acacia<WH7848> wood<WH6086>, and hewed<WH6458> two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68> like unto the first<WH7223>, and went up<WH5927> into the mount<WH2022>, having the two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> in my hand<WH3027>.

And he wrote<WH3789> on the tables<WH3871>, according to the first<WH7223> writing<WH4385>, the ten<WH6235> commandments<WH1697>, which Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto you in the mount<WH2022> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784> in the day<WH3117> of the assembly<WH6951>: and Jehovah<WH3068> gave them unto me<WH5414>.

And I turned<WH6437> and came down<WH3381> from the mount<WH2022>, and put<WH7760> the tables<WH3871> in the ark<WH727> which I had made<WH6213>; and there they are as Jehovah<WH3068> commanded me<WH6680>.

(And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed<WH5265> from Beeroth Bene-jaakan<WH885> to Moserah<WH4149>. There Aaron<WH175> died<WH4191>, and there he was buried<WH6912>; and Eleazar<WH499> his son<WH1121> ministered in the priest<WH3547>'s office in his stead.
From thence they journeyed<WH5265> unto Gudgodah<WH1412>; and from Gudgodah<WH1412> to Jotbathah<WH3193>, a land<WH776> of brooks<WH5158> of water<WH4325>.

At that time<WH6256> Jehovah<WH3068> set apart<WH914> the tribe<WH7626> of Levi<WH3878>, to bear<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Jehovah<WH3068>, to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> to minister<WH8334> unto him<WH1288>, and to bless in his name<WH8034>, unto this day<WH3117>.

Wherefore Levi<WH3878> hath no portion<WH2506> nor inheritance<WH5159> with his brethren<WH251>; Jehovah<WH3068> is his inheritance<WH5159>, according as Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> spake unto him<WH1696>.)

And I stayed<WH5975> in the mount<WH2022>, as at the first<WH7223> time<WH3117>, forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights<WH3915>: and Jehovah<WH3068> hearkened<WH8085> unto me that time<WH6471> also<WH3068>; Jehovah would<WH14> not destroy thee<WH7843>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me<WH6965>, Arise, take<WH3212> thy journey<WH4550> before<WH6440> the people<WH5971>; and they shall go in<WH935> and possess<WH3423> the land<WH776>, which I sware<WH7650> unto their fathers<WH1> to give unto them<WH5414>.

And now<WH3478>, Israel, what doth Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> require<WH7592> of thee<WH3372>, but to fear Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, to walk<WH3212> in all his ways<WH1870>, and to love<WH157> him<WH5647>, and to serve Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> with all thy heart<WH3824> and with all thy soul<WH5315>,
to keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and his statutes<WH2708>, which I command<WH6680> thee this day<WH3117> for thy good<WH2896>?
Behold <WH3068>, unto Jehovah thy God<WH430> belongeth heaven<WH8064> and the heaven<WH8064> of heavens<WH8064>, the earth<WH776>, with all that is therein.

Only Jehovah<WH3068> had a delight<WH2836> in thy fathers<WH1> to love<WH157> them<WH977>, and he chose their seed<WH2233> after<WH310> them<WH5971>, even you above all peoples, as at this day<WH3117>.
Circumcise <WH4135> therefore the foreskin<WH6190> of your heart<WH3824>, and be no more stiffnecked<WH6203>.

For Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, he is God<WH430> of gods<WH430>, and Lord<WH113> of lords<WH113>, the great<WH1419> God<WH410>, the mighty<WH1368>, and the terrible<WH3372>, who regardeth<WH5375> not persons<WH6440>, nor taketh<WH3947> reward<WH7810>.
He doth execute<WH6213> justice<WH4941> for the fatherless<WH3490> and widow<WH490>, and loveth<WH157> the sojourner<WH1616>, in giving<WH5414> him food<WH3899> and raiment<WH8071>.
Love <WH157> ye therefore the sojourner<WH1616>; for ye were sojourners<WH1616> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
Thou shalt fear<WH3372> Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>; him shalt thou serve<WH5647>; and to him shalt thou cleave<WH1692>, and by his name<WH8034> shalt thou swear<WH7650>.
He is thy praise<WH8416>, and he is thy God<WH430>, that hath done<WH6213> for thee these great<WH1419> and terrible things<WH3372>, which thine eyes<WH5869> have seen<WH7200>.

Thy fathers<WH1> went down<WH3381> into Egypt<WH4714> with threescore and ten<WH7657> persons<WH5315>; and now Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath made<WH7760> thee as the stars<WH3556> of heaven<WH8064> for multitude<WH7230>.
